name: Cozy Fleece Hoodie
description: This is a full-zip hoodie with a kanga pocket and a double-layer hood. It’s made with Tna’s Cozy Fleece — premium, midweight fleece with a soft-brushed back, sueded face and cloud-nine cozy feel. Its fit has been perfected season after season for the ultimate relaxed look.
